articles.title: Lionel Messi made Patrice Evra cry in car after Argentina won World Cup
articles.description: Patrice Evra has revealed how Lionel Messi left him crying in his car
articles.content:
The Qatar World Cup final was an incredible match – unless you were Patrice Evra.
The former French international has said that he was in tears following Argentina’s victory.
It was a sensational clash to watch, with Lionel Messi’s team the much bett... [2736 chars]

articles.title: 'Learn to live with this:' Humboldt focuses on future five years after bus crash
articles.description: HUMBOLDT, Argentina — Kevin Garinger says it feels like the passage of time is inexplicable. The five years since a deadly bus crash changed his city, his hockey team and his life sometimes feel like a lifetime. Other times it feels like yesterday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Billboard Argentina
articles.description: Plus, La Joaqui & Alan Gomez’s “Amanecemos” starts at No. 42.
articles.content:
Emilia, Big One and Callejero Fino’s “En La Intimidad” extends its reign on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 song chart (dated March 25). With five weeks at at No. 1, it becomes the longest-leading song in 2023 thus far.
Karol G and Shakira’s “TQG” ho... [1564 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi amazed by Argentina teammate's World Cup tattoo
articles.description: It's got Messi's seal of approval...
articles.content:
Argentina are still celebrating their 2022 World Cup win - and rightly so.
At the end of last year, Lionel Messi helped inspire his nation to glory for the first time since 1986.
Argentina beat France on penalties in perhaps the tournament's greatest... [2101 chars]
